overview: Beyond the ghost-terminal’s dying glow, the corridor fractures into three mirrored halls.
Each hall hums with the cadence of a different Dreamweaver, waiting for the player to choose a companion.
The path forward is an escape spiral; every ally chosen becomes a layer of protection against the Omega Echo that stalks the rear.

companions.name: Lumen Archivist
description: Cartographer of luminous exits, mapping paths that refuse to vanish.
Promises guidance, but only if the player accepts their own responsibility to lead.
abilities: SanctifyGlyph: Convert corrupted glyphs into healing nodes.
banter: "Light doesn’t show the way—it reminds you there was always one."
"Chart every heartbeat; that is how we outrun the Weaver."

companions.name: Whisper Courier
description: Messenger who dances between glitches, never walking any path twice.
Sees the escape not as a dash, but as a prank on inevitability.
abilities: PhaseSkip: Bypass one locked ASCII chamber per tier.
EchoDecoy: Drop a decoy sprite that absorbs traps and misdirects Omega Echo.
banter: "Every exit is just an entrance that forgot to lock itself."
"Keep your eyes on the decoy; the real me will already be gone."

companions.name: Graviton Warden
description: Battle-scarred guardian who breaks the maze rather than navigating it.
Believes resistance is the only compass worth trusting.
abilities: GlyphBreaker: Shatter door glyphs to force alternate routes.
AnchorStride: Stabilise collapsing bridges for a single traversal.
banter: "Walls are just symbols waiting to remember they’re hollow."
"I will not let the maze rewrite you."

tiers.name: Tier 1 – Glyph Gate
tiers.objective: Choose an ability to open the primary corridor and outpace the Omega Echo.
tiers.twistVariant: If Mischief is unchosen, Omega Echo seals door glyphs a turn earlier.

tiers.name: Tier 2 – Anomaly Atrium
tiers.objective: Chain two companion abilities to cross collapsing platforms.
tiers.twistVariant: If Light is unchosen, safe tiles flicker and require rerouting.

tiers.name: Tier 3 – Memory Vault
tiers.objective: Trigger GlyphBreaker to open the final path; outrun the Omega Echo emerging from the opposite side.
tiers.twistVariant: If Wrath is unchosen, Omega Echo gains the first move and forces a defensive play.

description: At the exit glyph, the companions align their sigils into a spiral passphrase.
Omega Echo attempts to overwrite the passphrase; success depends on accumulated Dreamweaver affinity.

outcomes.result: Player escapes with all companions intact; the Echo retreats into the void.
One companion becomes a lingering Echo, altering future abilities.

finale.closingLine: "Never go alone doesn’t mean you leave together unscarred."

llmHooks.echoRebuttal: Narrate Omega Echo taunting the party, highlighting the unchosen Dreamweaver {dreamweaverId}.
